Topic.Title: HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!

Message.Msg: Wrong, seems your IQ is in the single digits, you do not read much and your in denial. Most calories in the form of carbohydrates come from drinks, I think Mayor Bloomberg might know something about this also. HFCS is a synthetic toxin and is getting Americans sick. Look around you at everyone's weight and bulging abdomen, read about "VISCERAL FAT" in the abdomen or better yet, go to your doctor and let them explain it to you before you get coronary heart disease, diabetes or cancer. Your at 5 times the risk of heart disease with a 40 inch abdomen.

Topic.Title: HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!

Message.Msg: Anyone ever tell you that you're batsh^t crazy?

Topic.Title: HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!

Message.Msg: Looks like I gave you too much credit. You truly are clueless. If you actually did any research, you would have already known that what I posted was true. "Foods contributed 67% of calories from added sugars compared with 33% from beverages" http://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/databriefs/db122.htm
